stepUploadDesc: Select and preview your XLSX file
stepTemplateDesc: Set email subject, body, and attachments
stepSendDesc: Execute the email sending task and view progress
uploadInstructions: XLSX File Requirements: First row as header. Fixed columns: A=email, B=title, C=status (program-filled), D=send_time (program-filled). Other columns are custom placeholders.
subjectTemplateHelp: Use XLSX column headers like {{title}} or other headers as placeholders.
quillPlaceholder: e.g., Dear {{CustomerName}}, thank you for your purchase...
emailAttachmentsHelp: Selected attachments will be sent with each email.
sendIntervalHelp: Set a delay between emails to help avoid being marked as spam.
resultsInfo: After processing, you can download the updated XLSX file (including send status and time).
antiSpamAdviceSectionTitle: Advice to Avoid Being Marked as Spam
antiSpamPoint1: Personalized Content: Use placeholders from the XLSX file to personalize each email as much as possible. Avoid sending identical emails perubahan.
antiSpamPoint2: Avoid Trigger Words: Refrain from using common spam trigger words in subjects and body (e.g., free, earn money, urgent, click link).
antiSpamPoint3: Sender Reputation: Ensure your sending domain has SPF, DKIM, and DMARC records correctly configured.
antiSpamPoint4: Mail List Quality: Regularly clean your mailing list, removing invalid or inactive addresses.
antiSpamPoint5: Unsubscribe Mechanism: Highly recommended to provide a clear and easy-to-use unsubscribe link or instructions.
antiSpamPoint6: Warm-up IP/Domain: If using a new sender email/domain, or planning large volumes, gradually increase sending volume.
antiSpamPoint7: Content Quality: Provide valuable content to recipients; avoid pure advertising blasts.
antiSpamPoint8: Test: Before large-scale sending, send test emails to your own accounts on different email services (Gmail, Outlook, etc.).
modalPreviewSuccessMessage: XLSX file previewed successfully! You can now edit the email template and start sending.
modalSendErrorMessageFile: Please upload and preview an .xlsx file first.
modalInputIncompleteSubject: Please fill in the email subject template!
modalInputIncompleteBody: Please fill in the email body template!
modalInputInvalidInterval: Please enter a valid send interval (non-negative number).
modalInvalidFileTypeMessageXlsx: Please select an .xlsx file. Other formats (like .xls) are not supported.
statusJobStarted: Email task started (ID: {jobId}), connecting to event stream...
statusDataLoaded: Loaded {totalRows} data rows, preparing to process...
statusComplete: Processing complete! Total {totalRows} rows, {successCount} successful, {failCount} failed.
modalPreviewNeededMessage: Please upload and successfully preview an XLSX file before proceeding.
modalInputIncompleteBodyAndSubject: Please fill in both the email subject and body templates!
configEmailPassHelp: If already configured and left blank here, the existing password will not be changed.
configEmailFromEmailHelp: This email must exactly match the SMTP Username above.
configModalValidationEmailMatch: Sender Email must match SMTP Username.
configModalNotConfigured: SMTP settings are not configured. Please set them up to enable email sending.
xlsxImageAltText: Example of XLSX file structure for email sending.
